properties.description: Our initial focus is on catering for students and older people but we will certainly give a warm welcome to all visitors. There will be: soup and a roll and hot drinks; books, newspapers, magazines; games and puzzles; optional fun art and craft activities; optional short guided tours of Bath Abbey
properties.title: Bath Abbey

properties.address: 16 St. Margaret's Street, Bradford on Avon, Wiltshire BA15 1DA
properties.description: On Wednesdays mornings 10:30-12:00 we have a ladies meetings with craft activities. On Friday mornings 10:30-12:00 we have a men's gathering and at 12:30-14:00 serve soup & rolls to everyone who would like to drop in.
